text: Willelm kyng gret his biscopes & his eorles & his scyrgerefan & ealle his thegnas frencisce & englisce on than scyran thar Walkelin bisceop hafeth land inne & men freondlice.

And ic kythe eow thaet ic ann & wille thaet Walkelin bisceop beo his bisceoprices weorthe & aelc thaera thinga the thider in gebirige on lande oððe on strande oððe on wude oððe on felde oððe on laese.
And his sace & his socne toll & team & infangene theof binnan burh & butan nu swa full & swa forth swa ænig his foregenga fyrmest heold & weold on eallen thingan.
And ic nellan gethafian thaet aenig man beo swa deorf that him fram hande drage heonanforth aening thara thinga thaesthe he ricthlice age & in to his bisceoprice gebyrice bi minan fullan freondscype.
Forthan the ic wille thaet se bisceop habbe his land & his men & ealle his thing mid micelan weorthscype.
